lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us-- Fuck. Bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. That's how to start the year. Well done. Welcome. We missed you guys. Happy new year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're really glad to be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holidays were way too short. Or way too long, or both, depending. Anyway, we're back and as part of that, we're going to kick in first with our announcements before we get into tonight's episode. First and foremost, we have our fantastic returning sponsor going into the second year of their support of our campaign here in Wildemount: D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That all monsters shall be organized, not by the color of their skin, but by the challenge rating of their character. That all people enjoy freedom of religion, except in Wildemount because they be assholes. That monks somehow be allowed to attack, like, 14 times a round. And that everyone sign up for D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something like "Make Exandria Great Again," or "I "Like Pike," or "We are All the Sam We Believe In," or something? If you have a good slogan for me for my campaign, go on Twitter and Tweet it to @DnDBeyond with the hashtag #SamForPresident. In conclusion-- conclusion, conclusion, conclusion--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's that empty in there, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering and applause)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the wave? There you go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find this out as the year progresses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you lose, will there be a concession speech?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't lose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if none of us want to write a speech?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get Dani Carr to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Thank you very much, Sam. And thank you, D&D Beyond. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also really sorry for everything. Sorry whoever might be the president of D&D Beyond, so sorry. Probably someone at Curse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sitting at his desk, paranoid, looking over his shoulder now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it took this long for me to actually get one in my mitts and I'm super excited about it. It's awesome! It's the best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said cutting-ass technology.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It cuts the ass, let me tell you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It should be the phrase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. On Wednesday, January 23 at 5:00pm Pacific on our Twitch channel, you can tune in for Pub Draw, a new creative series featuring Babs Tarr, fantastic artist and friend of the show and the channel, doing fantastic lessons on how to draw various things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make sure there's no titties, you can't show nips. Nope, this is fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, is that Ciri?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) It's all titties!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it is. That's totally Ciri. There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have Witcher-vision. Getting more so with the gray patch. I haven't grown this out in a long time, and when it comes out, and I'm like, "Oh, I'm getting old. Oh boy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't know it was going to be there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I knew I was starting to get a little gray, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every time you do one, it's a brand new surprise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's exciting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just straight wisdom. That's all it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, next week, January 18th through January 20th, we have our first Critical Role art gallery, celebrating the fantastic community artists that have been there from day one and then some that have done incredible art pieces that are going to be on display as a part of the Art of Exandria art show. I've been wanting to do this for years. We finally are able to put it together. Seeing some of the art was starting to be putting up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were at the gallery yesterday looking at stuff blown up. We're going to be back tomorrow looking at other stuff blown up and it was overwhelming to see the art that you guys have made blown up larger than life. It's going to be emotional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over 50 pieces of art will be on display at the gallery throughout that entire weekend from Friday to Sunday of next week. Come and check it out. That's at Gallery Nucleus. You can look for all the info you need about it on critrole.com/events. And I believe with that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoa. Wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have an announcement, but I just want to thank a couple of people. First, I want to thank @chaotic_redhead on Twitter-- not Marisha Ray, a different one-- for sending in this great hat right here. We got this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could use that tonight

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not the last one. There were four octopus hats sent in today. Two were for me, and two were for Brian Foster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is magnificent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Amazingness. This one--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Work it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I can see!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the point of all of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. As you were, Matthew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave it on. Please, leave it on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like beautiful curls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to have a dramatic interaction with that, please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [water bubbling] [thunder] [explosion] (chanting) Role! Critical! Role! [dramatic Critical Role theme]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) They got magic and flair, they got falchions and cunning. They don't see over there there's a monster incoming. Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice. Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, roll the dice! (chanting) Role! Critical! Role!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Can you answer the call? Diggin' deep in your soul as the legend unfolds. Now it's your turn to roll! [fire burning]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein after surviving their encounters in Darktow, traveling to and from Urukayxl and managing to release one of the gathered orbs of Uk'otoa's sealing. You made your way to the depths of the Diver's Grave and recovered the third of these orbs that you've come across. Two of which now reside within Fjord's person. You then proceeded on towards what you believed to be the location of one of these temples through a series of visions you've had by Uk'otoa. I knew it was coming. You made your way towards this archipelago. Looked around, set your ship in the center, cast Water Breathing on the group, and you all dove down beneath the waters and found this slightly angled ruin. This partially crumbled temple that sits there at the base of the ocean floor. You saw long, straggling pieces of seaweed slowly waving with the water and what looked to be drowned bodies tangled in them that upon your approach, began to clamber towards you. You fought off a number of them, managed to clear that space and then investigate within the interior of this temple tower. Looking inside with a bit of light, there looked to be some sort of large, mutant crustacean-like creatures all gathered up on the inside. Not entirely certain of the number, just a series of claws and armor and barnacles. Backing away, you all just set yourselves on the ocean floor about 50, 60 feet away from the base doorway. And that's where we left off. So Mighty Nein, let's go ahead and roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, just getting in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I forgot how to play.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I did, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you better hurry up quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a natural 20! I did it. I remembered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I did!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all at the top of the tower? Are some of us at the bottom of the tower?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's totally an Ashley roll. Jesus.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: (humming the intro to "Under the Sea")

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Under the sea--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, see? That should've been on your playlist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Organize yourself where you would like to be in this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were we all together? We were all together at the base of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said you were all together about 50 to 60 feet away from the base of the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is after lighting up the inside and then backing away from it? Is that how it went down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were clambering on top of it, looked inside, and then moved off of the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the door that I'm seeing right here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Greefy? Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The greefy right there? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little greefy? Like that greefy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the water. I like the water!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a door on the other side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should kick up a bunch of sediment and hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you know right now there's just this one door here and a lot of cracked sections of the stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we have-- No. Did we? Was that a different time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our seaweed stealths.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did coming up to this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was earlier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's been ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Initiatives. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at all of us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This tastes like salisbury steak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You eat a hamburger with a fork and knife?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really messy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a communist?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pay attention!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tiny violin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Fjord, Jester, and Caduceus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a seven. Sorry, Ashley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't been attacked yet. We just heard a commotion inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) That is such a benign "Correct." Sure, nothing wrong here in the middle of initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, Nott? You guys are up first. Nott has a higher dexterity, so technically, you can go first unless you want to coordinate something together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing? What's happening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go in and investigate through one of these cracks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to flank and we can kind of peek in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do a little scouting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, clearly the top is the damage, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the damage? What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean, they're big we think, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We saw them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not going to come through that little door, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The crustacean things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The crustacean things. Of which, I think there are three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know how many. There were a lot of them moving around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw a lot of movement inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we get close to the door in case something comes out, and we'll ready our attacks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, it's been a while. I thought the plan was to draw things out through the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Then that's works well for our previously aforementioned plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that. Nott and I will get in position, flank the door, and hold our attacks in case something runs out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we can get that far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20 for you for one movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead and use my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to get over here if you want to, or you can use a ki point and bonus because it's half movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, and then hold my action. Right? So I'll do that and use a ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use action and bonus to get over there-ish. How far can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And I'm somewhat obscured by the aquarium?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and I'll hold action of the Tinkertop Boltblaster in case anything comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to use my movement to get behind this rock, and I am going to, about 30 feet away from Nott, hold the Haste spell for the moment I see her starting to attack something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Beau?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, to Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Nott. Got it. Finishing Caleb's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing potion. So you marked that down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's further around than you think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: None of us can really see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a faint pause as you're holding back and preparing your spell. Two elongated bluish-green hands peer through. Some sort of a humanoid looking creature, but its skin, somewhat of a deeper, bluer tint than the fish humanoids you had battled on the way in. You see it kind of peeks through and glances out toward those of you who that are currently still visible across the way. Its face humanoid. Eyes a dull, sunken yellowish-green color, but where its mouth is, it's two flaps of skin, like a central mouth that is vertical. Peeks out, you see rubbery, dark tendrils that pull off of its head like a thicker Predator, just beyond the interior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the inside, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was a-scared and frightened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it peers through, its jaw opens up, splits open. You can see two rows of teeth on the inside and the bony projections that holds it open and gives it this six foot wingspan of open jaw to each part. It gives this dull screaming noise as it begins to dart forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six foot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From the doorway? From where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the doorway. First off, immediately Nott and Beau, you were holding actions. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slamming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, look at it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one. (laughs) Happy 2019!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the hell is coming off of it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trigger Caleb casting Haste on Nott if I saw her attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So for the time being, you are considered hasted, and Caleb, you are concentrating on Haste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that doesn't apply until my next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I rolled a 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, do I get sneak attack? Or does she see me? He. It.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, it does not see you, and it's adjacent to Beau at the time as it rushes past Beau. It seems more focused on the group in the back. So your attack does hit, and you do get sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! That is 18 plus eight. That's 26 points of-- no, plus five, sorry. 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. As the creature begins to skulk through and kicks off the stone outside of this temple, it swims at a faster speed than you were expecting, and as it darts past Beau, Beau swings but goes wide, no impact with the staff. You, however, use that moment, watch as the bolt from the crossbow sinks into its chest. It braces a bit, but keeps darting forward, using the rest of its movement to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to the group and I go: One's coming your way!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we fucking see it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to the group and go: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a unique sound, because you hear Nott's scream go, "Ah!" right as its voice (roars). It screams out this high-pitched, three-toned whine that causes all of you to reach for your ears. I need everybody within 30 feet to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys get an extra d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20 for Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, Yasha, and Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get a d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It went 19 and then went to one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez louise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 13 for Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and I get to add a d4 from being blessed? Okay. 11. Still not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha and Fjord are all right. Beau, the rocking pain in your head causes your vision to go white and your muscles seize up and you are stunned for the next round. Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just barely manage to shrug it off, no issue. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel the adrenaline burst into your system and you begin to move backward, preparing your next bolt, it sears into your brain and your scream immediately cuts to a halt as your lungs hold in place. Jester? Natural one. You as well find yourself doubling over here, your feet pulling up towards your chest as you float and drift to the side, clutching yourself. Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just manage to shrug it off. It hurts and your hands go to block it, but as soon as you shake it off, your eyes focus forward. That's going to end its turn. That brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use my 30 feet of movement with my mariner's armor, and I'm going to move north on the map as far as I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can swim, so there is an up and down if you need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will, with my bonus action-- I'll keep it for now. I don't know what else is in there yet. I'm going to fire off two Eldritch Blasts at his bitch ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 12. Probably won't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn. And a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, thank god for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one, it sees you move and you see its brow furrow, realizing that you weren't impacted by the scream. The first one, it ducks out of the way. It spins around and you catch it with the second hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten points of Eldritch Blast damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you are stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you will have your next turn. It only lasts until the end of its next turn. As you sit there, grasping at your head, you can taste iron in your mouth mingling with the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bit my tongue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, I see how this is going. I'm going to cast Bless and hit Caleb, Nott, and Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so all you guys have Bless. Now you have dual Bless, most of the party. This is actually a pretty good combo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm Blessing that, and then I'm going to move out of the way. I'm going to go around that rock and over to the side there. Yeah, anywhere I can get over there, get a little bit of distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Along the ground?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, probably go up a little bit. I want to be able to keep an eye on things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd put you at about there. All right, that ends Caduceus' go. At this point, you hear this scratching sound, skittering. The doorway that was right there, you watch something claw and tries to pull through and then shoves into it. The stone around the entrance breaks open and the entryway opens slightly as, bursting forth--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, what is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, oh jeez!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the creatures from the inside that you had seen before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that? What the hell is that?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw a glimmering hint of it, looking below, but you see this large crustacean-like entity that has heavy pincer claws. Its face descends into tendrils, these tiny little tentacles that writhe and curl under its mouth. It has a pair of four legs, very arachnid-like, that scurry across the ground. Another one skitters up to the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And another one from the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! How did they get all the way up? Can they climb walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They can swim, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can swim?! What were we thinking?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's next to Beau is going to take two strikes at you with its pincers.

lines.name: BEAU
lines.text: I'm stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, so that's advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that an auto-crit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 24 to hit. You take from the impact on that one dual sixes on two d6. That's 16 points of bludgeoning damage, and you are grappled. The other attack is going to be 18 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Miss?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, my armor class is 19. Bracers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we hit it, do you think it might break the grapple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Usually you have to try and pull somebody out of a grapple or push it away from them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she's in claws. She's grappled in claws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you, Gil! 21 plus a four from Bless, so 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it pulls you in with its grappled claws, tentacles begin to reach towards your shoulders and neck and, like a jellyfish, you feel the sting hit you, but you manage to just writhe enough away and whatever toxin that is trying to release and pour into your system doesn't actually find purchase within your internal body.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: 15, that's going to hit. That's 30. Yeah, I mean, that hits. That's 37 without the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh god, double fours plus 12. 16, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Damage for the second strike, go for it. As you swim down, quickly, falchion, whack, slicing across it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 on the first, seven on the second. 18 points total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau, you're still alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still alive. I'm doing all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so dumb that you have to write down--

lines.text: I'm only governing two characters right now! Fuck me. Can I cast it with a bonus action? Yes. With my bonus action, I'll cast Hex and get it up now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the one that's stunned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the stunned one, please. It'll have disadvantage on wisdom checks.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to use my bonus action to bring my Spiritual Weapon down and attack the one that is next to Beau because it's stunned.

lines.text: It can move 20 feet, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can move-- motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's short. It's 20 feet. I remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It floats partway down-- jeez, I keep dropping everything. Been gone for three weeks and I can't even function. It does get part of the way, but next round it can get down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls. What a stupid-- okay. I'm going to go up to the one that is... ugh. I'm going to-- (unsure sound) It's a tough decision here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go to the one that's attacking Caduceus. I'm going to get behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to swim up over the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up and over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get one, two, three. That's as far as you can get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it. Forget it. I'm going to stay where I am, motherfuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swimming is half movement, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. I'm going to fucking use fucking stupid Toll the fucking Dead on the one at Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Character drops. Fuck this bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody is ready to be out of the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I get it. 12 points of bong damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beautiful. The area around its head where there's an armored shell that protects its face area cracks a bit from the impact. Bits of its shell are starting to flake off. That one's starting to look pretty hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These things are tough, yo. I thought that was going to kill the one with Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move or stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to stay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, then. Caduceus.

lines.text: Man. Things are happening. Yeah, I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's at such a loss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These guys are really tough, and they're so spread out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. There's four of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's only for a round. Then I'm going to back away from this thing. I'm actually going to head around behind Jester, basically.

lines.text: That misses. I also might add that I have the Shield of Retribution.

lines.text: This is the first time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When a creature misses with a melee attack, you may react to the blast with arcane force. You have to succeed on a strength saving throw, but that's something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Eh. 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage, nice. The strength saving throw is a six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It must succeed on a strength saving throw-- is a six. I don't know what against. Must succeed on a strength saving throw against something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be your spell DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I think that's fine, yeah. You get pushed back 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (blasting) It gets blasted back from the impact. You see a flash from the shield and this bubble of energy well up and then force it back with a sudden impact as it gets pushed away. You dart around the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dart around the side. I'm coming as far back as I can towards that wall, and I'm going to hold my actual action to do the same thing with Yasha again, to give her the bonus kick to her first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will be my action, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. That ends your turn. Next up is their turn. The one that got blasted back is going to move, (counting) 30. It's not within range to actually get anybody, and it doesn't see where you are, so instead the person that it sees immediately is going to be Caleb. Then it moves the rest of its 30 feet to get into--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will it bump into me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say it knocks you a little bit out of the way, but it doesn't have anything to attack with because it used its action to get up next to you. Currently is in melee with both of you. No, I didn't come across you. It didn't quite cross your path. This one over here is going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did it get so far? What's their speed?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Double dash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fuck, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's stunned. This one here is going to be now up against Fjord. It's going to strike out towards you twice, Fjord.

lines.text: I thought he had his little moment with the little quick goblin.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: It's ignoring the goblin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Focusing on stronger things. The goblin's still on its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still do damage with it every turn, and it still sees it, and is considering it-- actually, I'll make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you used the initiative of the one that died by accident. It was coming up on this turn. It's all on one round, was what you said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you had it move, but you didn't have it do an action yet, I don't think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's true. You're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I tried to do Sentinel on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you did an action for it. You just tried to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have a reaction, or did--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were using you reaction to hold your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is my reaction, is to hold my attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you're holding an action, it uses your reaction to release it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's raging; I think it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is a 17 to hit.

lines.text: She's grappled by it. It has her held in both of its claws, holding her there in front and then tendrils begin to move towards her face. She needs to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 15 damage. Constitution saving throw. Does she have advantage on-- no. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she's great. 24 plus-- 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't even duck out of the way. She just takes it and it doesn't have an effect. It burns and nothing. I got that one and that one. Yeah, that's their turn. Man, that stun. That stun and that illusion. That ends their go. Yasha's up now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to try and get to Red Lobster with two more swipes of the Magician's Judge. Reckless for straight attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First one doubles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. What doubles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All the damage. The first one is doubled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, great! Okay, cool. 16 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, nice, and the second one is only an 11-- oh, wait. An 11 plus four. 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it! But the first one does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the first one does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike goes through, so it's full damage times two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet. (counting) 19 times two, so 38?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of damage. How does Yasha want to do this?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Golf claps!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sweet. She will come down in an overarching right with that Magician's Judge, and on the second one she'll shove the sword in and crack that fucking thing like a beautiful fillet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she drags it down the side of its body, she puts her foot up, and using that, she pushes to the side and watches it tear in half. You see a bunch of internal purple sinew and muscle tear open. It gives this horrible dull squeak sound before it goes limp and begins to float and slowly sink to the bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Yasha) So many people leave so much good food in here. Got to know how to eat lobster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Yasha's turn. She has movement, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll take her 15 feet towards the other two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. One, two, three. She gets into that one there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she get on his ass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is still stunned, because it's until the end of your next turn.

lines.text: As I'm upside down in the air, I'm going to take my two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So dope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No attack of opportunity from the one that's stunned, so as you flip through the water--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go for the one that's not stunned first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on. That's good! That's a 17. I really need to do math better. 22, plus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits. You can roll and extra d4. It's still going to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the first one hits. Roll damage for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and then I'm going to try and stun him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How much damage was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one. So now he's stunned. Monks, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Monks are insane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dart over, remember the place right under its jaw where you're seeing its tendrils are trying to go towards you, you jam the staff right into its throat there and as it does, it pulls back, unable to really get its bearings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beautiful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. I'm going to go to the one that's already stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are both happening in the air as you're arcing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is just a straight roll, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn. The luck on this round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. Real cool story.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Double that to a nice, awesome two. Six.

lines.text: My crit was less than my--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And flurry of Beaus. One more time. Pop pop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Branding? Somebody make that a t-shirt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically they're both stunned, but which one do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do the furthest one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the one that was stunned first. Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow that's not cool. 13 plus-- give me a four. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Bless! Okay, that would have been awesome with that critical. Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack, same thing. Wait, no, hang on. Six plus seven, so 13--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cocked. It's very cocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the only time I've ever seen a cocked d4. On the edge, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It went in between my dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're able to read people's thoughts after that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll only know if it's Inception or not if it falls over at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is two impacts as you bludgeon that one who's stunned and arc on the other side. It's looking hurt, but it's still in the fight. That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Beau's done. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a rogue, I'm going to go bolt, bolt, bolt and fire three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got 25, 25, and 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those creatures are all stunned and they're within your short range, so you have advantage on the attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. 20 and then really low. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so they all hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you didn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't specify which one. I've got to reroll all of them. I'm rerolling all of them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all good. I didn't know I was going to have advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you do. All right, first attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, first attack is 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Second attack is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Third attack is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Against which ones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one that looked real rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike is against him. Roll your sneak attack on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus five, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bolt gets lodged in its throat and it just managed to shrug off the-- actually no, that one's not stunned anymore, because it was the end of your turn. Oh man. I got this all confused. My own fault, go ahead. That first one probably would have hit anyway at this distance, so that damage does take it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first time I rolled the first two hit and the last one missed. Want to go with those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So two hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The first one wipes it out. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would love the bolt to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three weeks. Getting rusty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. I would love for the bolts to go-- Fjord's right in front of it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would love the bolt to go out through its head and stop just shy of Fjord's face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crap fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slowly crumples to the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What in tarnation?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sweet molasses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your next strike. The other one is stunned, so those two other strikes would have hit, so you're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I should roll for those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll damage for the other two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damage, okay. Both were the same. Both were seven points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 14 total. Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the one that has the Phantasmal Force on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes? So that one also takes an extra five points of psychic damage from a goblin on its face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hasted Nott, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes the impact and spins around trying to look towards you, and it sees you, but then you're still on its face. It's very confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a confusing fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's not having a good day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just wants to live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Nott. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those dice are really pretty. I like how they're themed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to move, because it will claw me in half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably. That ends your go, Caleb. The impacts in the front of it. Parts of its chest blacken from the blast of the Magic Missile, but it shrugs it off. This one seems relatively, comparably unharmed to the others. It's taken a few hits, but it's doing all right. That finishes your go, Caleb. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm worried about Caleb. Okay, let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This could be awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to grab Beau's arm and go: Come on, first mate, and cast Thunder Step. Take the falchion and shove it into the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a blast of electrical energy and this force wave immediately sucks in and they're missing. They're gone. Where are you guys going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to come to Caleb's aid right here. Does that sound good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And right behind me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right behind Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 3d10 plus Hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it get a dex saving throw against that to try and reduce damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A constitution saving throw. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So does it take damage? Half damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It takes half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 20 solid, so just ten. Ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. As the water explodes and then sucks in, the creature is stunned and is looking very hurt, but it's still (snarling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. It's only within ten feet, and I think Yasha's 15 feet away from where Fjord was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. The creature is ten spaces wide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. With my bonus action, can I transfer my Hex to that fuckstick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Fuckstick has been Hexed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh sorry wait, d6 for Hex. That's six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For which one? Oh, for Hex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because I cast Hex on that bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Hex was the other one that had died.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. You're right. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, Caduceus, you're up. Caduceus, you reappear in your space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi, Caduceus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move my Spiritual Weapon down to try to hit the one next to Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has advantage because it's stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh sweet! Doesn't it balance out, though, because it would've been at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a Spiritual Weapon. It's not material, so it's not hindered by--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Eight plus four is 12 points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use the Spiritual Weapon and try to shove it into its mouth over and over again, saying: Eat it! It's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually it jams itself into this creature's maw repeatedly as it backs away. The back of its shelled head begins to crack before it splinters at the back. The Spiritual Weapon emerges from the back of its skull and it crumples to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then for my action I'm going to say: Oh, hi, Fjord, and I'm going to jump up and land on its back next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Inflict Wounds at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Because of Caleb's position, you do have flanking bonus, so you have advantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a spell, so there's no disadvantage right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, it's a touch, so it's not a melee attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it's considered a melee attack, so you would have disadvantage on the strike, but it give you advantage because he's there, so it's just a straight roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! It's like, "What's up over here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how many? How many do I roll? 4d10-- no, wait. 4d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d10. Ooh. Roll some damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 points of crab damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to Sacred Flame this guy. I'm going to step back a little bit. 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make an attack towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Get rid of your stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 21 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take eight plus six points of damage, that's 14, and you are grappled, so you do not move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I still get my attack, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Also make a constitution saving throw to see if you can maintain Bless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points of damage? And constitution saving throw. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Bless fades. Those who were blessed by Caduceus, you no longer get your d4 bonuses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's okay. We've appreciated it this entire fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a dex saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex saving throw? Natural one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's nice. Take seven points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to continue its path. It releases Caduceus, and it's going to go all in on its original quarry, which is Caleb. It's a natural 18 plus six, that's 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that hits, sorry. I was going backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of bludgeoning damage, and you are grappled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack. That's going to be 20 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 11 points of bludgeoning damage. As it slams both of its claws into you, it's grabbing you from both sides of your torso and legs, pulling apart as the pain hits in. It grabs you in towards its face and its tendrils lap around your head and neck area. Make a constitution saving throw for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels like Frumpkin, only painful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the venom pulses into your body, you feel your entire torso, legs, arms, seize with searing pain. You are paralyzed and poisoned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh! What does that do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if the roll had actually been--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why would you have had to change it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I have the transmuter's stone, which is giving me proficiency on constitution saves, if I'm remembering correctly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a DC 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, and that would be enough to resist it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You found that fast. You're turning into Mercer. I can't find shit in that book!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the poison begins to pulse into your system, in the moment the pain begins to hit the back of your skull, you immediately glance towards the transmuter's stone that you're clutching in your right hand, and with that, you feel the energy pulse through your body and shrug off the toxin from entering the deep parts of your system.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put it up top, Widogast!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a slight crooked little smile peeking out from underneath Frumpkin on my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Ending its turn, Yasha's up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End it, Yash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she peek in the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that she doesn't think all of her friends can't handle it, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The queen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, no, I'm not killing Ashley's character!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through the interior of the now partially jagged, broken entrance to this temple's base, you can see this very heavily covered, seaweed-infested interior that wraps around the inside, and one central, big, knotted tangle of seaweed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that Yasha's turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round: Beau and Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll drop her rage, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it will. It's where Nott's been the whole time. Hiding right over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you want me to see if I can punch this guy first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you go first. You're way closer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take my staff for this one. I'm going to, between Fjord, go: Excuse me! See if I can get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Excuse me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back, you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get! Get on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You scoot around and jam it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a 20 for two seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does this always happen to me? Yeah, that's pretty good, though. 21. Okay, that's 18 plus two, so 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your second attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then the next one is missing, definitely missing with a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. Your first strike is prodding it with the staff. You still have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess I'll just punch it one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The club punch. Bitch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Through the crowd, grabbing its hair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walk away with some weave in your hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, I don't think that's going to do it either, unless-- 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses, unfortunately. Doesn't miss; you impact and reach through and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Beau's turn, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll swim closer. I'll fire. Actually, with one hand I will take another swig of booze, if I can under the water somehow, and with the other hand, I'll fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll your sneak attack damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking one-handed bandit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I double it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dice damage is doubled. (counting) 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here. It's a crossbow bolt. I would, again, like the crossbow bolt to tickle Fjord's ear as it whizzes by.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little slice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, just a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief bit of warm, hot, sharp pain on the outside of your earlobe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --as the bolt enters the base of the creature's skull. You don't see it protrude. You don't even know where it went. You just see it vanish and the creature is standing there for a second. As it falls onto its back, its legs all curl in like a spider and its claws close in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Accidentally, because I rolled a natural 20, I shoot again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time you, with the falchion, rake it out of the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, it's the thing! It does it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I believe you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass as you guys glance around the area to take in whether or not there's some danger. You manage to pull off the pincer from around your body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right. I think everybody could take a few minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, Caleb, you guys look bloody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this look bad?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb pulls up and there's claw piercing all along the ribs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, looks like shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the salt water--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's cleaning it. I think we should maybe rest a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb sits down in the muck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, if we went inside, then at least anything that's swimming overhead with big teeth might not see us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as nothing attacks us inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take ten minutes and give everyone a little bit of a boost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated Swedish accent) No, I don't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks back from the inside and goes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He tried to do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Error 404!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks back and goes, "There's a cluster of seaweed inside." Steps into the interior-- doesn't enter the entire structure, but steps in the middle, waiting for any sort of direction from you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deuce, do you want to take a look, make sure that it's not the ravenous variety?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll look in the door before we sit down. Is this thing giving me a vibe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nature check, oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll help Caleb over to the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My nature check weirdly sucks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll help Beau!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know, it's funny how my nature check is terrible. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the seaweed in this interior, it is of the same variety as that which is clustered around the rest of this tower. It is not similar, from what you can tell, to what you encountered at Dashilla's lair in the Diver's Grave. You're not certain if it has any interest in you guys, but it doesn't seem to be reacting to your presence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't seem to be a problem. We're just going to be here for a minute, and then we'll be on our way. Let me know if you've got any issue, and we'll do our best to stay out of your business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for kelp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that, regardless of the character, Taliesin likes to charm plant life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do! Plant life needs love, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Life needs love to live!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, see, now I feel better about the whole-- thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (NPR announcer voice) This is Grass Talk on KCRW.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the rest of you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to go in and find a little bed of seaweed and lay down for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the stuff in the middle. Maybe just lay on the silt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anybody who needs a heal, I'm going to do the ten-minute-- I'm going to start in the interior of this the Prayer of Healing, so anybody who needs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anybody against a short rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need a short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we afford a short rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we have 24 hours of breathing, so we're okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty tapped on ki points and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will not say no to a short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's get inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing's looking for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am dropping and leaning against Beauregard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind, I'm not casting the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, that was very impressive, I must say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Oh, you mean that little Inflict Wounds that I did?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the use of the lollipop. Really nice stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, that lollipop's pretty freaking cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's old business. We've seen that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys take a short rest, you can use your hit dice to heal up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you doing your thing? No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, if we're taking a short rest. That's if you don't want a short rest, but you want to roll out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're around down here, can I swim around, look for any other trap doors, or doors, or doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a perception check at first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Then make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see all the different slowly-waving tendrils of seaweed cluttering up a lot of that space. The center area, you glance over, and you can see where that big mass of seaweed and underwater plant life is. Along the edge of where it is, you prod it, and it softly gives a little bit, past the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a door or something over here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's back up to full.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have been outside looking at the (clicking) that we fought so I can look at him and see what's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Careful as you head out there. You don't know what's above you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He cares about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much detail as you can make off of it, other than its jaws limply hanging open, these dull lifeless flaps where you can see the toothy interior of its mouth as it hangs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does its busted-up robe have pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that was a journey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that was. What was it before I accidentally hit it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, four! Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that! Change your group name to The Mighty Four here today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are not paying attention to things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! Well, you're all a little busted about that previous battle. No pockets, no keepsakes. It looks like it's pretty plainly adorned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there something in the middle of all that tendril in the center of this tower? Is it obscuring something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what he said. It's actually a hole in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go over and look. A lot of this is-- there's roots around the edge of it where some of the plant has rooted itself to the stone floor of this temple, but there's large portions of it that go beyond those roots. Upon pushing on it, it has some give below that central area. It looks like there's some sort of opening or a space below the center.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I suppose we're going to be heading down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to disturb the fauna. Is there a more genteel way to make our way through?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be having to head down below. We're going to try not to disturb your root structure, but if there's another way down that you might happen to know of, we would appreciate any clue as to what that may be. No shift in the water, nothing? No little twitch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize to the interruption of your very calm day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did one of you do healing and I missed it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did a short rest, so everybody thumped. Are you all right with where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you know what, though? I bet that the seaweed is actually really happy because before it had those crab things, and claws and stuff constantly fucking with it. Now we're really nice, and it's calm and peaceful in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we don't have the best history, but sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With this seaweed specifically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, you find anything on that guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he had a robe on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No pendants or necklaces or keys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not that I could see. It seemed like a pretty old robe that didn't have any pockets or anything. He did have really long, tendril-y hair, which was pretty cool! Did you want to bring the body inside or something so that whatever is out there won't see that we killed it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that. Yasha will help you pull the body back in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you guys go out there together on a walkaround, just a little-- you guys could go together is all I'm saying!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who, Yasha and her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Fjord! Fjord and Jessie could go together!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Yasha's really strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but so are you, and you could show him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go on, have fun, take your time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need any money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm okay right now. Thanks, Mom. This is the body; this is what I was talking about with the tendrils, with the hair and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty gross.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any jewelry or pockets or stuff on it? Keys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm real good at these.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no pockets. I already looked and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cocked. That's worse. 11, no, yeah, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing on it but the tattered robe it's wearing and its weird, somewhat almost dolphin-like rubbery flesh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's pick it up. Maybe we can offer it as a gift to the (slurping) as we make our way down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, creepy! I'll hold its hair if you want to hold its feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Are you grabbing the tendrils? Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys drag its body back over to the tower base.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, you okay with us chunking this into the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's a door or something? Why would we let somebody know that we're coming if it's a doorway? We could peek our head in down below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I meant we were going to toss the body into the seaweed and let it have a snack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if-- well, I mean, place it next to the seaweed, see if it has any-- I don't think this is carnivorous, but it's worth checking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's just seaweed, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh okay, I thought it was the gnarly kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not that kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay, never mind. Sorry, I misunderstood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. What's up? What're you guys doing? You've taken a short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's that door that we found in the middle of the seaweed looking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could try to move some of the seaweed with Mage Hand or something. (whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The seaweed itself is pretty knotted and tangled and twisted around itself. As the Mage Hand gives and pulls, it very softly releases its hold on the other tendrils and pulls apart, like someone sweet talked a bit of it. It's still tangled and still a lot of it there, but it's not holding taut. You imagine that someone could probably climb through it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to climb through it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I will. It's my job.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go right after you, too, just in case something goes wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will it sting me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think so. I think that they're pretty friendly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go touch it, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you reach out and your hand grasps the edge of the seaweed, it moves with your touch and drifts a bit. It's seaweed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's nice! It's nice seaweed. Thank you, seaweed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello, bees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go down. I'll push through and see how far I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, you're the smallest of the troupe, so it's not as hard for you. You begin to descend, ten, 20, 30 feet or so, and the seaweed isn't dissipating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very Poltergeist, in a way, as you're pulling your way through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fjord, I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance and look inside, and you appear to be in some sort of a spherical chamber, roughly about 60 feet across, side to side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm at the top of it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at the top of it, looking down. There are clusters of seaweed. All around it, there's plant life that's embedded in aspects of it. A bunch of the seaweed is all coming up and tangling towards the center to create this upward column of plant matter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where the roots were, and it was growing up through the tunnel or something? Oof. I don't see any signs of life or light or structures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm terrible with this. 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking a moment, very carefully, eyeing the space, no signs of life. Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two little fish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chomping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're this big.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They went for my jugular.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're very smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the place looks relatively empty beyond the plant life that exists there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would advise coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to go back through it again, so I'm going to stick down here. If you guys want to come, just come. You can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She wants us to rally below. It is gross on the way down, but okay-ish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross how?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I crawl down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: I follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody follows? You all head down. It's a slimy climb. Since you're all a little larger than Nott, especially Yasha, there's a bit of difficulty in pulling through. At some points, Yasha angrily tears bits apart and starts making her way down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all eventually manage to clamber through, slipping into the lower chamber. All of you get to see this large, spherical chamber where the wrapping seaweed spirals upward to fill that space. The structure is semi-familiar in size and design to you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've seen a place like this once before, when we were in the temple previously with Avantika. If you will help me, you could search the floors and the walls for any sort of recessed sphere shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (stage whisper) This whole thing is a recessed sphere shape, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it needs to be about yay big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Light fills the space. You can now see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last time you went down into one of these, we had to make a very quick exit. Do we have a plan for making a very quick exit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if we find we something that looks like the previous situation, then maybe we could send some of us out of here before we put the key in the lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will the key in the lock release the (clicking tongue)?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. As far we know. I don't think it will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can cast Water Walk if we have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I have a weird question because you became a champion after-- well, you became a champion, and Avantika was a champion. When Avantika died, someone else become the champion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think so. I think it's to get the three spheres in the three temples. She did hers and died. I have the second and the third, but that's my logic. I must concede, I don't know how many temples there are. I'm only going off of that art that we saw in the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were three in the art, and there were three balls, and you got the two balls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is ball three?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Ball two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There should only be one, in theory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a long look around during this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ball two? Wait. You have two in you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you looking in the space? Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's holding two keys, basically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He got one ball. We put in one ball. We got another ball. He has two balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're about to put another ball in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of plant. A lot of plant matter. A bit of stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no guarantee there is another temple somewhere, with another person with dreams like you and Avantika, who has already done this? This could be the final piece of the puzzle, if we understand the carvings we saw correctly, even. We don't actually know, do we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you ask your god? Could you ask him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I do that, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, do it like I do to the Traveler--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he answer you when you talk to him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He does?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start looking around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Traveler!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he totally just said, "What's up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you ask him if he knows anything about this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Traveler, have you heard anything about this weirdo Uk'otoa guy?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers) "Uk'otoa."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 investigation. A few things catch your eye. As you're all having this conversation, Caleb dives towards the bottom and begins rummaging through the base of the seaweed to look on the base. The first thing you notice is there's a skeleton.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A skeleton?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over, and other people are watching Caleb as he starts rummaging through and finding there is a collection down here. There is a six-inch-wide, thick glass sphere that appears to be empty that's resting on the ground as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An empty, standalone sphere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It was rolled into and wrapped around by some of the local plant life. You do see as well a small, green piece of stone, carved to look like a feather almost, but it's made of a deep jade or green stone, and a small piece of agate stone that catches your eye, mostly covered in grime. You rub off and polish it. You can see the agate stone from beneath it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Agate, A-G-A-T-E?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is someone writing this stuff down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm about to do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Potion, sphere, feather-shaped stone, and an agate stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Agate stone, skeleton.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's four things. Plus the coins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what agate is. What does agate look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's brownish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have it all, Marisha?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. The feather was--

lines.name: LIAM
