lines.text: It's a stone shaped like a feather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gave you some agate dice. Those little ones that I gave you, those were green agate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And plenty of coins. As you are rummaging through the coins, and you shift through where the glass sphere was, it rolls off the side. Beneath where it settles with much of the coins, you can see a lot of coins are filling the space, but there's a little bit of a divot, roughly about the size of half a fist, in the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look like this sphere that I've found is the same shape as this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The sphere that you found is larger. It wouldn't fit. It was resting in the space. It has grime around it. You rub it off a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a see-through glass, or is the same color?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a see-through glass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will alert everyone that this stuff it down here. I gathered up all of the things that are not coins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh look, coins!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skeleton as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're picking up coins, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys start gathering and shoveling coins into your pockets and pouches and everything. Both of you guys, make investigation checks for me to glean how much you can find amongst the tangled seaweed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (inaudible murmuring)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much money did we find?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long are you taking? Are you going until you can't find any more? It would take you about 15 minutes to do it. It's a lot of coins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep going. I mean, as long as everybody is hanging around talking, I'm going to keep searching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys keep searching. What are the rest of you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, are you going to Identify these things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going to take the time do that now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. We can do it on the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will need some time. I heard you whispering about this bauble, so I will begin on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like I heard of things like this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if someone has seen us through it, they already have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My question to you-- oh. They could see us through the glass sphere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In theory. I sat down on the floor-- oh shoot. I cannot do it now because my books are in your bag. If I take them out, they would be ruined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I haven't opened it. Don't worry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that crazy investigation check of yours, did you find any recessions in the floor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a closer look at the skeleton with the armor to see if the armor looks identifiable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The armor is studded leather. It's well made. There's a bunch of black sediment and general slime and grime from the red plant life that's gathered around the various plates of it that are fastened together, but it rubs off relatively easily. It's well made.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No iconography? No identifying symbols?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fail me now! Okay. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks fairly plain. As you pull it up, the bones snap and the skull tumbles off of the neck and spinal cord. As that happens, you glance on the inside. While it looks plain on the outside, on the inside of the shoulder and the back of the plate, you can see faintly pressed runes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Magic armor!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too clean to be normal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't recognize that armor, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever this armor is, it didn't seem to help this fellow much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think killed him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he look like his appendages are all attached? Any cracks on the skull or face or any sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're the one who's asking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I did say, "What you think killed him?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Hey Jester, could you make a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll give it to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's searching for coins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You each get to roll as you take a look at it. Game the system.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus. Can you talk to this dead person?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think to put that in my bag for this particular run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking at it, the lower parts of the ribcage on the inside, as well as the hips and the pelvis of the skeleton, are crushed. You look at some of the crushed bones, and you pull it back; you can see scrapes across the bone, like edges of something sharp that had crushed through it also had some sort of an edge to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it got crushed by the pincers and then crawled down here where they couldn't follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My brain went super elaborate and thought that this chamber crushes people if you fuck it up. That makes way more sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought that maybe somebody sat on his hips, like he was having sex or something, but it was too much for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man. Reverse cowgirl death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's the question. Do you do this alone, or do we stay here with you? We're at a disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I need to do it alone. If I'm going to risk getting out quickly, I don't want you to have to do the same. There's only one recession in here, so one sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's maybe keep a friend with Mister Fjord. We can keep eyes on him in the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Frumpkin, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can cast Haste on Fjord, and that way he can get away quickly if he needs to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the time we clear the room, there would not be much time left to that spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which I think it'll be fine with just Fjord and Frumpkin--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have my mariner's armor. I have my normal speed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could be outside, up in the top layer of the temple, and wait for you, whether or not you need help, or whether or not it's time to run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (background music)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you need someone to stay with you in case you have to make-- What if you turn evil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to be in the room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not going to turn evil! I'm not going to

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She did it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now look. I think we're overthinking it, right? Same as before, I anticipate some crazy arcane stuff to activate. Maybe a little rumble and a shake. You guys have been more than accommodating. You don't need to be down here with me when it happens. If something does go wrong, that should be my burden, my price to pay, not yours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see through Frumpkin anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the chamber closes and you're stuck down here, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think it will, and only because, if Uk'otoa really wants me to do all of this for him, what good would trapping me down here do? I have the third sphere. I don't think he's going to hamstring me like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know him pretty well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't, but I wouldn't gum up the one person that was bringing me the thing that I needed to get out of demigod jail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You still mean to veer away from all this once we're done here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'd like to. I don't know what that looks like. I don't even know how that'll go, but I don't want to release a sea-snake beast on the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to expend a use of Expeditious Retreat on myself which will, A, make me a little bit quicker. I would change the nature of the Transmuter's Stone to let me see in the dark, and I send Frumpkin to glomp onto Fjord's arm and shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better hand him that hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be waiting for you upstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fair enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything starts to go wrong, we'll try to get to you. If you're encumbered, we'll try to clear a path, and once you're up with us, I'll bring everybody to the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you hear the signal, take off. You remember the signal, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (choked screaming)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that signal happens a lot, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a common signal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We hear it a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit down really fast and say: Hey, Traveler. I know that he's doing something for this other god guy, but we both know this other god is pretty stupid, so if you do me a favor and watch after Fjord, that would be really great, because he's done a lot of things that has really helped out with stuff for you and he's going to be pretty helpful in helping me get to you later this year. Anyway, I really like you and I really like him and I would like if you would help out, please. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go and sit down right in front of Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, what'd he say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you hear what I was saying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of. You had a little projection on it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I thought I was whispering. Hold on, let me think. I'm listening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to tell me, it's fine. I appreciate the sentiment. It's okay, you can go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really hope he does help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be safe, Fjord. (whispering) And also, don't turn evil, okay? But if you do, I'll still be your friend. I mean, it's okay. You know, some people are evil. It's okay. Just don't turn evil to

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or anyone else? Just you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really, any of us would be nice, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (background music)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, get going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While all that was happening, I was picking up some platinum and gold that I found--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's if there's any left!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: What, what!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Combing the silt, and I've got the armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all make your way up and begin to clamber through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go last, and on the way out, I tap Fjord on the shoulder. Good luck, and I'm looking forward to seeing you upstairs. I cast Protection from Good and Evil, protection from evil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what that does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what that does, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good luck, captain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you all ascend and vanish from sight, leaving Fjord and Frumpkin behind, you look down upon the base of this interior chamber-- the same recess that you had met before at Urukayxl beneath the temple of the yuan-ti. You can see, now that you're surveying it by yourself, standing over it, the hints of the same spiral grooves that all emerge from it in the similar pattern as the one you previously saw, carving up the walls and meeting the upper area with the faint bits of runes occasionally visible along the same form of prison-enchantment placed on this chamber as the one you've already seen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will kneel down in front of the recession and I will look at the eye that's in the pommel of the falchion. (different voice) Let's see what this does. And I'll place it in the recession.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stone shifts again and cracks, and you see bits of stone and leftover sediment begin to release within the inside of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time to go. I'll head towards the tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The rest of you up top, all of a sudden, you feel this seismic activity around the base of this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we all get outside and be here right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's on his way, we should already start moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cracking) A second one. You can see now-- previously, these very difficult-to-find-- runes that were filled in with bits of dust and sand and muck that had gathered, begin to burst up and reveal the same yellow runes that you had seen previously in the temple light up the chamber around, where the hydra battle took place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at the runes in the armor that I'm holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No apparent connection from what you can tell. However, as the second impact hits, the tower (crumbling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all begin to leave. What order? Who's going first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm swimming quickly ahead of everyone because I'm Expeditious Retreat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're next.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll push Nott in front of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't need pushing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't matter, you're being pushed through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay-- ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Beau, I need you both to make dexterity saving throws, and you as well, Fjord, as you make it going through the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your-- plus dex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a natural one, so it doesn't matter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we rolling for?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just the three of us, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of bludgeoning damage as bits of the stone knock you around. You take half of that, so you only take seven. What'd you roll, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a seven, so you take the 15 points as well. As you manage to move through the space and just as, Fjord, you emerge, and the rest of you begin to make your way outside of the temple, you hear this low rumble. You watch as some of the rubble that was tumbling inside suddenly begin to push upward. The current of water around you begins to change in an odd way, like there's a sudden suction you weren't expecting, and all of you begin to be drawn towards the temple once more. All the seaweed begins to tear loose and be thrust upward. There is a geyser bursting from the chamber below where you once were, and it's causing this vacuum that's pulling you up with it. All of you make strength saving throws, please, to try and grab something in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh. Can I cast Control Water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, if you'd like to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everybody around us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're pretty tight-knit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of you may be, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've shot ahead a little bit, if it's under ten minutes since I've cast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we were just going through the door, so we're getting sucked back towards the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are being pulled back towards the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Control Water and try to change the direction of the water around all of us so that we can push away from the geyser and get farther away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll allow that. Don't even have to make saving throws. As you all begin to be pulled into it, this vacuum, as the geyser is tearing up, you watch as the temple that was collapsing is now being pulled up and bits of the stone are being thrust up into the sky above it into the top of the ocean. All of you feel the immense drag and then it laxes again and you turn around and see Jester sitting there, arms out, forcing the will of the ocean around to hold tight and still around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Swim away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we all going up? Let's go up! I'm casting Water Walk on everybody, including you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you begin to rise up at a rocketing speed towards the surface of the ocean. As the water passes by, you manage to all emerge from the top. The speed that you're at, now that you know it's coming, you manage to do your best to slow your descent and land carefully; I won't make you roll for any damage. As you all land, you hear this (whooshing) sound as you glance over in the direction off the side of where that temple top would have been. There is a geyser shooting a hundred feet in the air. Bits of rock are being thrown like volcanic bombs in different directions, and then (quieter whooshing) it loses its force and power, eventually coming to rest, and the ocean is no longer spraying into the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship's maybe a few hundred feet from where you were.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's walk that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I didn't know you could mess with water like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Fjord, haven't you seen me Control Water before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, they both made the ship go a little faster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm forgetful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not like that underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys jog your way towards the ship. You see somebody off the side notice you and start shouting to the rest of the crew, at which point the sails are unfurled a bit and, as you guys make your way towards the edge, they throw the rope ladders, and you all begin to climb your way back onto the Balleater's deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We really got to do something about that at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What? What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not in the water anymore!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank god. The water sucks so bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it worked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get any special stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do something!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you feel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would I know if I got something new?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense that lingering pins-and-needles hasn't quite faded entirely. There's a buzzing energy about you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something connected to water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I can try. I'll reach my hand out towards the sea and lift up my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Borrowing from the imagery that you've seen with Avantika's attempts at shaping and manipulating the waters that surround her--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cleaning herself on her balcony?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. As you will the water to follow-- and you guys watch this as well-- it extends in a tendril and wraps up to the edge of the ship and seems to be awaiting a command.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you can do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly, at this point, has rushed up and is like, "Captain, where we going?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make for the coast, Orly. We've had enough time at sea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right," and begins shouting out commands, and you hear a voice shouting out from the crow's nest, Marius LePual, "Captain! Ship sighted!" and you see him pointing off to the side. You guys glance towards the southern archipelago island, and at the edge of one of the cliff sides where there is a waterfall and a bit of the forest gathered there, the front of a boat is emerging from what is a previously-unseen seaside cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask a question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Watching through Frumpkin's eyes as he did everything down below, other than hearing Fjord talk without his twang, did I see the tendril that appeared, or was that all in his mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you saw was him place the sword in the spot, there was a flash of light from where it was, and he was immediately-- There was no time passage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So just heard him speak and heard him wedge a sword in the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. We'll be right back here to see what happens here for the next bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That was amazing, Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really cool shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Before we jump in, our winner of the fantastic Wyrmwood giveaway tonight is Drinscorpio. Drinscorpio, congratulations. We'll get your info and get that sent to you ASAP, but well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my first D&D character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot to hand these out at the break. If anyone wants a durian candy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like durian fruit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Durian fruit candies, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it smell like durian?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it smells and is made out of durian.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the hell is durian?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't open it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it. Do it, Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ever see those super spiked Asian fruit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They smell like rotten flesh when you open them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, don't open that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You going to do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's got a wrapping on it. You have to take the wrapping off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mouth full) What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wrap--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, remember what--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (garbled noise) (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were only warned six times before you put it in your mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you like durian?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an acquired taste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you all get onto the ship and Orly begins to make the course, you hear Marius LePual shouting from the crow's nest that there is a ship emerging. You turn it and look towards the southern island of the archipelago and see, emerging from a seaside cave that you had not noticed upon entry, the front of a ship, the bow piercing the edge and making its way towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's it look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On a course to intercept? Starboard, port?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like someone who waited for us to do the hard work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're dropping all the sails. We're getting the fuck out of here, and I'm going to use Control Water to push the back of our boat out the fucking archipelago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, the sails begin to drop-- begin to pick up the wind and make your way which direction? East, north?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: North. Northeast, the way-- I imagine that's the closest one. If there's a closer opening, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Northeast would be the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Making that route-- you're giving the direction-- the sails pick up and the ship begins moving. As the ship turns around the corner and you're glancing as it makes its way in your direction, no colors flying. Similar size, if a little bit smaller than your ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a first mate...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get a dope first mate kit, like a spyglass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a spyglass on board, as part of the equipment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use the spyglass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. Make a perception check with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you open it like that, or do you do one of these (flick) and then use it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I absolutely (whoosh) and then...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Argh! Just straight perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. Wait, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He said at advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with the spyglass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, it's cocked! You don't get to keep it, but it was like, "20, fuck you," at an angle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This literally happens to me so much! That's better, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all dressed in drab, dark grays and blacks and greens. Sails fully open at this point, and you do notice that there are gunports on it, four gunports on the side that you can see that are being opened currently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you said they weren't flying colors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, no flags.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I turn around to Fjord, relay that message, say: They've got gunports! They're about to fire!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain, Captain! Should I go under and ready the cannons? Captain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make ready the cannons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aye-aye, Captain! (screaming)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want me to give them fair warning?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. What's the distance from the ship? If we had to guess it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, from what you can gather as you're turning around and heading in that direction-- because you were towards that southern island for the place in between the three of them where you found-- it's maybe about, at this point, 2,000 or so feet away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say close enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are taking down some of the crew to begin manning the guns?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no idea what's an appropriate range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You have the special officer action on the lower left area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Special officer action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's also one here for the captain and the first mate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so happy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the statistics for your ship. As we are currently--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Just kidding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a ship fight! I'm getting emotional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taliesin, do you have any idea what the range on a cannon is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cannons you have here are 120, short range, 480-foot, long range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. We have seven cannons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they are more than four times further away than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I still have a Control Water, so once they're within 300 feet, I can make their life very unpleasant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought-- was she the boatswain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the boatswain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the boatswain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Who did the ropes and the sails?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I have this written down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm the boatswain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm the boatswain!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now a boatswain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all the boatswain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're a carpenter. The boatswain was Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, what do you need?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you have access to these actions as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least, it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top two. The only person that gets the bottom action is you because you're the master gunner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, because you're the master gunner. I see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I can deal with the top two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys fleeing, or are you engaging?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing, Captain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am reading this card!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, we're digesting!

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: (muttered reading)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cannon attacks deal an additional 1d10 bludgeoning damage. If the attack roll is one or two, the cannon misfires and cannot be fired again. It's an extra action, other than just regular loading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your crew takes care of the loading for you, but you as the master gunner, every round, can give that benefit to one of the cannons that are being fired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we can do two of these, right? That's what you just said? And the master gunner--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a minigame!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's legit a minigame! It's Pillars of Eternity, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hilarious how that game came out this year and this has been our adventure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good synergy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's helped me learn a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Each of us get two what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, the captain, the first mate, and the boatswain each have access to two special action options described below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Options.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Options. Full Speed Ahead, and Fire at Will. And then the master gunner has access to the Pack the Good Powder special action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, which is a singular cannon shot with additional loads of powder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many cannons do we have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have seven. There were eight, but one of them got damaged.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many on the side that's facing our interlopers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should tell you, you have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four on the port, three on the starboard, but we don't know which side they're on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, because you're perpendicular to them, you're going to have to turn to make that motion, which is how they're able to start gaining on you. You do have some lead time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we both facing the same direction right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, no. You're facing where the ship was when you got on in a southeast way, so you're going to have to turn to make your way that way, but you can. You still have a little bit of gain on them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So are they on the starboard right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, they are on the starboard side, yes. Starboard bow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do each of these actions on our turns, or one of these actions a round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each of you can do one of these on your turn for the round-- once we engage in any sort of ship-to-ship combat, but right now, you guys are too far away. You choose now; you can either choose to engage or you can choose to try and outrun them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Run or fight, say it now. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said run. I think run's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I did, but you've already risked a lot for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they wouldn't be here if we didn't have something that they want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain, the cannons are armed and ready! Give me the order!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see how fast they are. We'll turn to flee into the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so are you giving the Full Speed Ahead action, essentially?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The sails unfurl, the ship begins to turn, making its way towards port side, arcing northeast to try and pick up the wind and begin to gain slow speed. The other ship has turned and is making its way in your path and is gaining speed rapidly. It was prepared for your arrival and it took you guys a minute to get everyone engaged to go ahead and start shoving off. It's closed the distance to about a thousand feet over the time it takes you to start, get everything ready to go, and head in that direction. Like I said, it is smaller, probably faster, and its crew are looking to try and catch up and engage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably faster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. Let's go ahead and roll initiative, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For all of us, or just for our boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For all of you, and the boat has its own initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For everybody with a thing to do? Because I don't think I have a thing to do, so I could just hang out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could just hang out if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start Identifying spells. I'm rifling through Jester's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have magic; you could be flinging magic at them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could throw fireballs and shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If they get in range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to roll initiative, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the ship did well with a 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In six-second rounds-- I don't think we're in traditional...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, however, not so great. That's a six for you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have some

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 25 to 20, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12. I tried to eat one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you eating?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The jackfruit candy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not jackfruit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Durian.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Durian. It's a durian candy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We usually get durian pastries after BlizzCon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then who's left, it's Yasha? But yeah, she--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she got a three. No, five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we roll for the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, their ship is 15; you guys got a six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? The ship had a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ships are moving. They're too far away for you to fire. In giving the orders to move, you guys are managing to stay pretty neck and neck as far as travel for the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To maintain distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it doesn't. Their sails maintain up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Their sails do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their sails do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They got magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long is your Water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's gone. My Control Water was just to get us out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mine's not. It's up for ten minutes and it's at the back of the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been more than ten minutes since you guys shoved off though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well, there you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if we maintained speed with that and they're a fast boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, we need to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Engage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we put them between us and land so that maybe if we can ground them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no idea. I don't have any visual of where we are in relation to anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How clear is the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll show us? (gasp)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of distance-- I'm putting this down because it's more interesting to look at than just a table. But we'll say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that it's got little rivets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can have mine. I only do this to myself once a year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say this is them. We'll say this is you guys about a thousand to 900 feet away. Let me see, what can I use here for landmasses? Sure, that'll work. We'll say as you're coming around here, this is the island. You guys are heading-- this is north, this is east, and you're coming through this space here. We'll use this here as the other island as you're moving past, we'll say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Captain, let's hug the coast to our right a little hard. Maybe I can, once they get close enough, shove them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The coast off to starboard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I can shove them into the rocks, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to do a hard 45-degree turn? If we do that, if we turn starboard side, we can try and hit them with our starboard cannons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get around that little piece of...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're still out of range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've only got three cannons on the starboard side, though, if we turn to port side--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're still out of range by 300, 400 yards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't do anything until they're 300 feet away anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, yeah, let's aim to hug the coast on the starboard side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys maneuver and tend to hang in close, making your way in towards the island, they do gain a little bit of distance. I need you to make a survival check as you are currently leading the ship to try and avoid any sort of heavy rocks and things along the side of the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I would be doing this as well, can I give advantage to that, or can I roll as well on that? No, he has to roll on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the captain, unfortunately, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negative two to survival checks, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh. That puts you at a-- that's a three total?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Five, yes, so three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so three. Okay. Heading towards the side there, pushing a little close in to the island. Immediately you hear (collision). Not enough to damage the hull to a serious point, but it does suffer two points of slashing damage, we'll say, across the hull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is our hull at full strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I got that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving forward, it manages to dislodge from the rock, suffering another six points of slashing damage. You manage to pull off the rock. Noticing this jutting, the other ship rolls better and manages to avoid--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they close enough now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They are still gaining, though. They're about 600 feet away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How close do you need them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys continuing straight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. We're hugging the coast. We're going to continue in that same line. We need 480, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All this shifts over this way. As you guys continue to hug the side, they gain to about 400 feet... 300 feet...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to cast Control Water, and I'm going to shove all the water. I'm going to push them right into the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With a tidal wave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't quite tidal wave. I can do redirect flow, or I can do whirlpool, I think, are my two--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it creates a wave for sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's a wave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a wave?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I was worried with Avantika about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I remember, you could do a few different things. You could whirlpool--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A 20-foot tall wave that travels from one side--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 25 percent chance of capsizing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm throwing them on the island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While he's doing that, Captain, should we turn to engage or no?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Control Water? You're too far away from the beach to push them onto the beach itself. You have 300 feet from them, but they're still about 200 or 300 feet out from any sort of sandbank that would impact them. There are rocks in the vicinity, so I'll consider that a little bit of a benefit to the chance of capsizing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're attempting to capsize the ship, 25 percent chance. I'll make that a 30 percent chance. Roll a percentage die for me, if you don't mind. As you guys watch as Caduceus concentrates--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We roll a 30 or lower, it's good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percentile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so roll-- what? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got them so the-- yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, zero. Roll the dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the ocean (rumbling), swells up and slams into the ship. The ship (collision and rumbling) capsizes and scrapes onto the edge of a bank of heavy rocks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was really tiring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad we went through all that so I could get that spell once a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy moly! That was some serious stuff, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain! Captain! They're vulnerable. Turn so we can finish them off!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make it so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gleeful quiet cheering) Yes. Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turn to port. Prepare to fire. Smoke these motherfuckers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pack the good powder! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can also see what they have on board.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, after we splinter the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to get rid of that initiative order that's not going to do anything now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Set aside all these great--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've got magic. They could unflip their ship. We don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They obviously had some sort of wind in their sails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You gather, as you begin to turn the ship around and watch their ship, they do not have anything to right it from being capsized against a bunch of jagged rocks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'll be fine, if the can survive this barrage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have the order, men. Fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For the purposes of brevity--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I am so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, don't apologize! That's what this shit's for. That was a 30 percent chance for an immediate win, and you did it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there was a 70 percent chance it was going to fucking fail, and we were going to turn to port and get into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can roll those attacks if you'd like to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Three attacks? Which way did we turn? Doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three attacks, but the first one has additional damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Seven, seven, 14. There's plus six to hit, so 13, 13, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it all to the hull? That's most of what you can see right now. Was it 13, 13, 20 you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first two (whooshing, splashing). The third one slams into the hull. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're realizing the amount of hours that must have gone into the detail of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About an hour wasted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I'm reading into targeting the helm or the sails or the cannons...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to do this fight! Maybe the cannon blast flipped it back over again, and they've got a second wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to kill things with my cannons!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not shooting that great anyway. I think probably this was for the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the impact of being capsized by the wave, the blast of the cannon fire, and the fact that you're so close to the edge of the island put it in a position where it can't right itself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we see in the way of survivors swimming about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go rescue them? Get their shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're very far away. Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Are you guys okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are seven swimming survivors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cannons are loaded again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to grab one or two of these people so we know what was going on in the first place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or all of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might just be pirates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore, they're not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it's the same thieves who robbed us twice? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They tried their hand at a new occupation!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got a boat now, baby! This is going down!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm so glad... (nervously) No! It can't be!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're thousands of miles away from fucking Wildemount.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We even did another job!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw a rope out to one of the survivors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let me put my papers away.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Aw, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't apologize! That was awesome! That's how you do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice call, Taliesin. Nice call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, way to break the game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, I'm here to fuck your shit up. I will make sure you will never get to shoot a cannon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to go close and toss out a rope for a couple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have magic? Are you going to attack us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're shouting over the edge, the ones that you can see, they're mostly raggedy-looking human ne'er-do-wells. They look like they've probably been at sea for a while, skin tanned and burned in places. There is one tabaxi among them that is the only one that's actually responding to anything you're saying. She goes, "Bring us aboard. Show mercy." She's swimming, and trying-- the water is thrashing her around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do any of you want a tattoo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you bring up all seven survivors?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, it's up to our captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many manacles do we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, how many do you have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't fucking know. How many manacles do we have? Master gunner?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Manacles? I'm not on manacle duty. Fire! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you firing the cannons?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll keep them tied up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Captain, I would like to point out, the more people we have to bring on board, the more people we have to feed, or if we don't have enough food--

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: We have enough food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have enough food? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That I can help with. We should, maybe--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, will you make sure that none of them are magic users as they come up on board, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can kind of do that. You have to get them in a circle and keep them at bay for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who can tie?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be okay. I forget, do we have any firearms, or did the Plank King dock crews clear all that out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything that was on the ship aside from the cannons--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you got one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay. We'll aim our fingers at them instead. Get up here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not like they've got-- I'm sure they're not swimming-- well, we'll see. Let's get them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One by one, you pull the water-logged wayfarers that were on the opposite ship. They all get back onto the dock and look particularly frustrated, angry. They seem to be sizing each of you up with their eyes as they all take a place, a begrudgingly subservient position, until eventually the tabaxi gets up, climbs and shakes this wide-brimmed black velvet hat that looks stained and fucked up from the sea water. There was a large feather plume on it that looks like it's snapped in the middle and hanging. She's like, "Ugh. Well done. You cheated the hell out of "that, but what do you want of us?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you attack us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What else?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that wasn't very smart. (intensely) Don't you know how bad-ass the Balleater is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tabaxi, which wears a very calico fur coloring, head turns to the side and goes, "The what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Balleater. We eat balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the other pirates goes up and puts a hand on the shoulder and goes, "It's okay, "Captain. We got taken out by the Balleater." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fortunately, you found us on a day of mercy. You have a second chance at life. Is there anywhere you would like to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tabaxi's eyes narrow. "Are you the captain of this vessel?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And your name is...?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain Tusktooth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sticking with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Til the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Captain Serack Feng."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Hey, man, it's like both of you are teeth people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a better name. Better name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: F-e-n-g.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you have managed to sink the--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Cock Gobbler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--the Salty Criss."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Salty Criss?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have any treasure on there or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's beneath the waves. "Well, not anymore, but we "have our lives and a third of our crew."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, what was that last part?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A third of our crew."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You lost 14 crew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're not here, are they?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they tried to attack us! Bad things happen when you get--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, they attacked a ship after a gigantic geyser of water spewed forth from the ocean. I'd say they stuck their dick in it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It caught our attention."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We planned to make our way for the Menagerie Coast. Do you have any objections with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all wince at the idea. "Could you maybe leave us on the island?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you wanted in a city there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're pirates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you think, small one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sidebar. (clicks tongue)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse us a moment. Yes, master gunner?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain, we're not welcome in one of these towns. Maybe we could make some sort of a trade, give them some pirates that they've been looking for, in exchange for immunity, or at least clemency, leniency?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling Darktow would side with these people--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not Darktow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should probably drop them off at the island, give them some food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can do that. It would take a day, though. I can't really do anything until the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could give them really nice tattoos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll go into Nicodranas stealthily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could try to turn them in, and they could take them and us at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my fear. I like the way you're thinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you can swim.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You not feeling it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I want to risk it. Orly, make for the shore of the nearest archipelago coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you lending them a rowboat or tossing them into the ocean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just going in. No rowboat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, but one of them I wanted to give a tattoo to, come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about one stays on deck, and he's going to carry the canvas sack with some food rations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we've got some stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In order to eat, you've got to get the mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's totally optional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not optional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they want to eat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tabaxi turns towards the four men who haven't jumped overboard yet. "Hey, Levar. You're "up," and then jumps off. He's like, "Oh--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like tattoos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all really well-made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where would you like yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls it up, and the entire body is tattooed, from wrist--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about his face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you don't want a unicorn pooping on his face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Captain. I have specific tattoos that I've been working on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, my fault, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want everyone who comes in contact with the Balleater and Captain Tusktooth to walk away with his symbol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's his symbol?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Well, he's covered in most places, so pick your spot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where would you like it? Think about this! Think about how cool this will be! Think about in 20 years, when Captain Tusktooth is the most dangerous guy you've ever heard of, and there's stories about him. You will be able to say: I crossed paths with the crew of Captain Tusktooth and I lived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put it right there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so you can show people and be like: Hey, check me out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure, fine, do it. Just get it over with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know that hands are really hard because a lot of time, the ink, it spreads. Okay, I'm going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Oh, a dexterity

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You produce a fairly successful, clean tattoo of your intended design.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've gotten good at those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give them the food. Beau, will you show him the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right this way, good Levar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He jumps off the side of it. (splashing) At this point now, it's starting to get closer to dusk. They all swim to the shore. They've begun assembling whatever scraps they can from the nearby tree line to start building a small camp for the night. What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't breathe water again for another-- until we have a long rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I have my books back, please, before you draw googly eyes in the pages? Did you already draw googly eyes in the pages?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (jokingly) I don't know, maybe. Here's another one for you. There may be some surprises, maybe not!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orly, can we set a course for Nicodranas by way of Brokenbank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye aye, Captain. If I might ask, what business are we looking for in Brokenbank?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, just going by the normal trade routes, just in case we, I don't know, run across any trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No stopping?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How are we on supplies? Food, water? Anyone sick, hurt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know that, as first mate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If anyone's sick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, for supplies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There seem to be decent supplies. You stocked up at Bisaft Isle, and you have magical means of creating food if you need it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Food and water never stops if you need it, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brokenbank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the first--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the next stop on an established shipping lane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For many of the shipping lanes, it's the first port of entry to give your paperwork, to show what you're bringing in, to make sure it's all approved and going through. It's part of the process of things making their way into port.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're set, I think maybe a speed route would be great. Nicodranas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. He goes ahead and starts making his way that direction. From the archipelago to Nicodranas without stops looks to be between five and six days' travel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. I'll throw in some Control Waters once every day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll bring you down to about four and a half, we'll say. Yeah, between all of you guys being able to juggle that around. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I send a message to my momma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Momma! We are heading back to Nicodranas. Is it safe, do you think, for us to get there? Because I know that stuff is happening, and I haven't heard from you in a while, probably because I haven't sent a message to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My Jester, you're coming back? Well, I don't know specifically, but there does not appear "to be a manhunt. Just be careful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My momma says everything's okay! We just got to be careful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's the plan. Caleb, you want to take time to Identify your goodies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I certainly do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hand Caleb the leather armor as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go back to Nott and my quarters, and pull out the book, and take less than an hour to-- there's five things now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, because you rolled really high on that investigation check. What are the five things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was the stone shaped like a feather. It was the orb. It was a potion. It was the agate stone and the studded leather armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa, that's a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's also some coin that needs to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. No coin from the ship. However, you did manage to muster, in the time that you gathered beneath there, 48 copper pieces--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Between us or each?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Overall. You can divide as you see fit. If you choose not to divide, I can give you individual amounts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 silver pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 31 silver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 323 gold pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 platinum pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not too shabby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we dividing it up among the group?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think everybody gets 2 platinum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the math.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to point out that maybe we should set a little bit aside to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pay the crew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- pay the crew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone took a second to be like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the background, from over the side--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He jumps over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you see this little turtle head go, "Heh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there's any other business you want to take care of during this four-and-a-half-day journey?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would. I would like to ask Beau and anyone else that lives in the empire if they could tell me a little bit more about where they live and who is the most concerned about the news that we received about the war moving south.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I don't know. I can't speak for Caleb, the other empire kid--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Busy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Busy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's busy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's looking stuff up. You're from...?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm from Kamordah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. We came through the Wuyun Gates?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wuyun Gorge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: According to the information, they came all the way here to Felderwin, which is where Nott is from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where I'm from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My concern was that they mentioned that they used mountain passages. If you took this mountain passage all the way through Felderwin, you would go along this route. My concern was that you could easily go east in that path and hit Kamordah. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we'll just see. It's at the discretion of everyone. Once we're off the boat, I'm not the captain anymore. I don't know where the urgency lies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have no desire to go rushing back to my hometown. I think I'd prefer to go back to Zadash and check in, personally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even with an army bearing down on it? You have family there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we going to do to stop an invading army?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Warn your folks? Get them out of harm's way? No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I honestly don't even know if they'd believe me if I told them to run, so what's the point? Maybe we could better organize our efforts together in a larger city like Zadash, or go check in on Nott's family first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, I want to honor what you've said, but you only get one family. Are you sure that whatever's transpired between you is too much to drop a note?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, I got a note from my parents when I was at the Cobalt Reserve, at the Cobalt Soul. It seemed very clear that they didn't really want me to come back. My mother actually ended up birthing a son while I was at the monastery, so they got what they wanted. Got rid of me and thought that it would be best if we all parted ways. I took that letter as a goodbye and decided to continue on my way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have a brother now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a baby brother that I've never met.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No other siblings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you at all concerned that he might be an innocent in all this? He has your blood running through his veins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I guess I never thought about it like that. I never met the kid. It's hard to feel concern about something you have no real personal connection with, whether they're your blood or not. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe think about it. Him, at least. Could give the kid a chance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll know what to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyway, what about you, Nott? Are you here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Am I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys are on deck, right? I'm not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about me? What do you mean, what about me? I just want to get off this fucking water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we go check in in Felderwin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't mind swinging by, if we're going that way, just for a quick check in. I don't know what our ultimate plan is. Do we need to go to any more ball places?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I think we're fine for a while. My first priority was getting Jester back to her momma for a hot minute if we could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're pretty sneaky. We've learned some tricks. Wouldn't hurt to check out the fucking building that grows and shrinks as you approach it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't say no to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are in a completely different boat, at least. Ship. Ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can make ourselves look different than when we left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're heading up into the empire, we got to go through the Wuyun Gate anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting point, though. We forged papers for the Mistake, correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have papers for the Balleater yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ownership slips?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In searching the captain's quarters, would we have discovered any sort of

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, everything was removed at Darktow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, all right, well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might want to make some more--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Looks like I'll be forging some more. (speaking) I can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You made the first one pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I remember how I did it, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's a good plan, Captain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll touch on Nicodranas, forge some papers, check in with Mom. From there, head towards Felderwin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, do you have closure here on the open seas? Are you good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What exactly happened down there, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, did you release it or what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I did have another vision. It seemed like Uk'otoa was straining against whatever confines it was in, but not released. I saw a vision of another, maybe final, temple location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw a shore with three cities along the coast, and then a forest beyond that. Just before you got to a rocky mountain ridge, there was a single glowing light--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, a coast with three cities? That's the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could be. I don't really care, for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you afraid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you learn who you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, and the thing I wanted the most was-- in some of these, I saw a vision of Vandran, whether as a statue, or in a reflection, or something. I didn't see anything. Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vandran. Hm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's his mentor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've run out of leads there. I don't really know where that leaves me on that, but we've spent enough time on me. I don't have anything else to follow. Besides, there's danger coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could still send a message to the Plank King and see if he answers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb wanders back up at this point and starts listening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we let a little bit of time go by, but thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you in the slightest bit concerned that Uk'otoa might start speaking to you and putting more ideas in your head?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe there's more to be learned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he talk to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just those single words. He says things like "learn" and "adapt".

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps the tower, the strange tower that grows. Perhaps there's answers in there or someone who might know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, what does your falchion look like? Still have the eyeball in it? Is that still there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I summon it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look and see there is still the single eye that's always been in the middle of the hilt since your encounter with the merrow that first found it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, that was my favorite part. It would've been sad if it went away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm coming into this midway. Am I to take it we are headed to the mainland?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's good news.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it up into the Empire by way of Nicodranas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to go check in on Felderwin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that is a good idea. So you don't mean to pursue this any further right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. And if I can, I'd like to find some way out of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to ask you, does it concern you to turn away from this thing's desires? Do you worry it will abandon you? Leave you a mere mortal again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I like how I am now, and to answer your question: I have no idea. I've only been in its favor. I don't know what the other side would be like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you intend to leave the sea for now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think he can read your thoughts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if what he's telling you to do is go towards the coast, that is what you're doing, so maybe he still thinks you're on his side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't even know, do you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he'll be content for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm out of my depth. I have no idea, I don't know any more than you do. All I know is I'm ready to get off the sea for a bit. Unless I hear otherwise, all's well. No reason to assume otherwise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think the Wildmother can hear your thoughts?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I know the Wildmother knows everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if you think something dirty, she knows? What if you're thinking, "Oh, man, I really got to poop"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (stuttering) Sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you're thinking, "Aww man, I think I smell a little bit today." "I've got a booger in "my nose."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm thinking about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you think, "Oh, does my breath smell bad?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, your breath smells fine, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you smell pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's nice. Thinking about this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Speaking of stinky, Caleb, what did we get? What's all the stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been in the ocean for days and days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's the most sterile he's ever been.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did we get? What did we get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First, I want you to admit that I have been washed from top to bottom for a month.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you smell fantastic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are a nice fellow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. But no, really, I actually do think you smell better than nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You see?

lines.name: LAURA
