lines.text: I didn't say you're stinky. Nott said you were stinky, Caleb. I think you smell like salt and fresh air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a douche.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Revved up. It was very interesting. I'm so tired. There is one of these things that I am going to keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a lucky rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fun. Lucky rocks are nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is another thing here that I probably should keep, but I don't have to. This bauble lights up and floats and lets us see in the dark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Floats, like, in the air floats?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hovers a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a lantern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I set it floating five feet above the deck of the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That glass sphere that you found beneath, you watch as Caleb speaks the command word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is "tawaj".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rocks and lifts off the ground and hovers and gives off a nice, soft, white torchlight-like glow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it flicker? Is it like a hue light?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can it change colors?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not exactly, but-- it's dark at this point, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's probably evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if I say "fajar"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly it gives off this extremely powerful, vibrant daylight. The entire ship's deck feels like it's suddenly midday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really bright.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you hear (cannon firing) as we give away our location.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very specific use cases for that. I pluck it out of the air, and it should dim. One of you could carry it, but since I am normally blind as a bat, Beauregard has her glasses--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else? What else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so I will take both of these things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the other thing you're keeping, a rock thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lucky rock, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's a lucky rock do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a pet rock, but it brings you luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it allow you to reroll things, like the lucky feat? Said not as Beau, just as Marisha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it does not let you reroll things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what's it let you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a potion that makes one extremely strong for a short period of time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should give that to Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go over to Fjord and hug him around the waist and pick him up. I'm just kidding with you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! My back's popping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I honestly was thinking Yasha, and if not Yasha, then you, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To make you super strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what else do you have? I don't want to claim that if there's better things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stick that into my pocket. That's just a loaner in my pocket; I don't want it. Caduceus, I thought this would be good for you. I'm holding up a small stone leaf. I hand it to him. Don't put that on the deck, please, because it will turn into an actual tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will it turn into a tree in your pocket?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More than once, or just once?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't say on here. I assume--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, one time only.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a tree until we need it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An instant fucking big-ass tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60-foot-tall tree, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a ladder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could get into a tower or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or fuck up somebody's ceiling really bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then, Beauregard, this armor you found is quite exquisite, but you don't wear armor, do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not generally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's a bit hard to do all the flipping around that you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like full range of movement in many things that I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus does, I do.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it would be good for any of you. This particular one was a little better at protecting you, but also you can speak to this thing and make the armor look like anything you like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck, that would be great to have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be, yeah, but it doesn't work for monks. You can make it look like robes, or the fanciest golden armor you can think of, or a clown's outfit, or you can make yourself look like Fjord's clothes. It's an instant change of clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone else can do that already!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's clothes, though, it's clothes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it come with any protective--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's the first thing I said. It's above average.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't remember much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you need above average? Are you already bumped?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in studded leather armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As am I.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in a breastplate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what it is. It's studded leather.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Studded leather, plus one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either of you would get a bonus to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's endless, it's limitless. Am I reading that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whenever you want to, it can transform to any outfit you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either of you would be hilarious owning this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My armor class is less than yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. Plus you don't have a Disguise Self.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you should take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty much everyone can disguise themselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester and Laura are fighting right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look at it. We'll play cards for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we give this to Yasha? Fjord? Jester? This potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll hold it for Yasha. I bet it's giant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see it. Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's one fight, just become a beast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit! Yeah, she should have it, because that will affect her attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone's melee attacks, any of your strength checks. For an hour, someone's strength becomes badass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha drinks it immediately. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I was thirsty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a thing. That took me a long time to get to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For 23 hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, lasts for one hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you'll get disqualified from a lot of sports for taking that. That's for horses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we get to work on forging those documents for when we make our way in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes. I know what all these kind of ship documents look like! I already forged some, and also I'm around ships and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, add your proficiency bonus for the forgery kit, as well as your dexterity to attempt to-- actually, for this? Use intelligence. This isn't copying documents; this is forging documentation that seems to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made me do this last time. You made me use intelligence, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're doing intelligence because this is trying to create verbiage and documentation that you think will seem officious and believable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think, Caleb, you're very officious. Can he help me sound more intelligent than I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can aid you and you can have advantage on the roll, if he wants to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I look at the mote, you guys? Should I look at the mote?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mote? The shred of fate, or whatever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should take a look at the mote, and I will assist you, if you care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to look at the mote of possibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gives you a mote of possibility, but it is the dodecahedron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, when did we start calling it the mote?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crystal box, whatever you want to call it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm rolling intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intelligence and proficiency bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At advantage, because Caleb's helping me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to reroll again with my mote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you roll one more d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so much better than the two and the four that I rolled originally. 19, plus one is 20, plus proficiency is three, so 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using Caleb's aid and the time you have on the ocean, waiting for periods of relatively calm waters--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, I think I'm proficient with forgery kit. Oh, I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. You do manage to create a number of documents that both declare the ownership of the ship, create a false log of various journeys that you've taken in the ship, as well as forging a few signatures of individuals at Brokenbank that have checked in the ship in the past. Whose name is it under?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whose name should the ship be under?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tusktooth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should it be Tusktooth, or should it be somebody that's not a pirate-y name?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's legal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, a new sort of name. Do they know any of your names in Nicodranas? I mean, it could be anybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want it to be one of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, you could look pretty officious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we don't need any sort of official record tying us--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Orly? He's a reputable Nicodranian.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would be giving the ship to Orly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In no less than 30 words, describe to me why you should have this ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Captain, I couldn't possibly--" You see him really wrestling with the idea. "I can certainly "caretake it in your absence. You intending to m-m-mosey on northward, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can sell it, you can take care of it, whatever you see fit. You've done right by us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for himself and goes, "M-mighty generous. I can claim ownership by name only, but "we all know who the captain of this ship is. If you're going upward to the Empire, I can put the "crew to work. Earn a little bit of money for us and you. When you come on back, may be a little "bit of gold in it for you. But the ship is always yours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds quite agreeable, Orly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Orly your first name or your last name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "First name, doll."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your last name, Orly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Skiffback."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Skiffback. Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, goodnight." He turns around, makes his way--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring him with us. Make him fight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, did you learn how to do that from him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't done it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It costs a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we just need crushed gems in order to make them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tell Jester this. My parents, when they were trying to form me into a functional member of society, thought it would be a good idea if I got into jewelry making, so I have a jeweler's kit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could maybe crush some jewels?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could crush gems, yeah. Just throwing that out there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Orly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How hard is it to make a cool tattoo that's pretty? The shiny ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you need the supplies."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I told you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like 2,200.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Baseline. Then depending on the kind of tattoo, the cost tends to increase."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have that kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have that kind of jewels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet. One day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you do, happy to help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. Thanks, Orly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worryin'." Turns around and makes his way back out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Orly) No worryin', now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gather some of my stuff and go to the crow's nest. Get everybody--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're going up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you like a good book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to be reading up there, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't mean for tonight. In general.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll admit, I'm not the best reader, but I've read a couple books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you have. One of the books that we found in that ball of fun is about the corruption of plants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be curious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you might be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you could leave it in my quarters, that would be most agreeable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Surely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm. I'm glad you are traveling with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Me too. I've never felt so helpful. I'm going to climb up and set up a little ritual circle in the crow's nest and I'm going to light some incense and I'm going to pull out a piece of that weird fruit that I've been slowly growing some mushrooms on, getting a little weird, eat a little bit of it. I'm going to meditate and then I'm going to cast Divination.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fluffy little clouds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a light Divination.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a happy little scry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wonder what Vandran's doing right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stuttering) What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The warm, soft, comforting voice, like a breeze, drifts past your ears as the hot wind, unexpectedly through a cold night, drifts past your shoulders. "Staying out of sight. Making "amends." That's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intrigue! Secrets!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I head back down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Backstory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is there anything else you wish to do during this travel, or are we going to bring us in Nicodranas?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to go to Caleb really quick and be like: Hey. Did you happen to finish that copy of Avantika's code for me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. I go to my chambers and for the rest of the time, I want to try and memorize her code.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll go ahead and keep that in consideration. It'll take you a little bit, most of the trip. It'll help you for a while. You might want to keep it with you just as a reference point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I figured it might be useful because you know this code. You memorized this code; you have a photographic memory. I figure if we're ever in trouble, we can write messages in this code. Not too many people know it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I've been doing that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hesitating) Will you help me? Tutor me? It might go a little faster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. No time like the present. Let's go get to work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. You spend the rest of the trip working together to try and memorize it to the best of your ability. It is a complicated cipher. It's not like: this equals a, this equals b. There's layers to it, but you manage to get the broad strokes of it, and you can keep that with you if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to read that book too, but yeah, we'll talk about it later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no worries.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to spend the time on the deck teaching Sprinkle how to fetch an item. Like, if I show Sprinkle a button and hide it somewhere, I want Sprinkle to be able to get the button and bring it back to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an animal handling check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, there isn't a lot of chaos since you guys left the archipelago. Over the next few days, Sprinkle seems to take to it for the button and the bits of food and treats that you provide, so you seem to have taught a simple trick to your weasel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the Balleater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the Balleater. Anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of the nights, while getting into bed and Nott curling up at the foot of the bed as we customarily do--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you feel about returning home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I don't know we're 100% sure that we're doing that, but if we did, it would be nice to just sort of swing through and see what-- because they said there was some damage, so maybe just kind of see what damage has been done and if anyone-- you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're just going to buzz through? There's nothing you want to check in on, or--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering) Yeah, I'd like to check in, just see how the place is doing and, you know, if everything's still there. You know, just make sure that everything's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes it sounds like you don't have much love for home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a little complicated. I really didn't like most of it. Certainly not my clan, as I've told you guys. You know, there's a few folks that I didn't mind so much. There was one gentleman I wouldn't mind just checking in on, make sure he's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of your clan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering) No, just a friend of mine that I just wanted--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not one of your clan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. They're not my friends at all. They're bad. No, this was just this halfling man who lived in the town near where the goblins lived, and so I maybe just want to see if he's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was very special to me and I just want to-- I'm worried about him. Do you have anyone like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you do, just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not besides you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not at home, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not besides you. That clan is all right with you? Was there any friction that we should be--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I would assume not. No. They're not okay with me. I did not leave under good circumstances with them. If we pass through, I would either not want to see them, or if we did, be ready for a fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. So, you want to go home briefly, but not to see the clan, but just this one fellow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm. (stuttering) Yeah. I don't really--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are very--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm just so nervous about it. I don't want to see the clan ever again if I can help it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, we're going around your home, is what you're saying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we might have to go through it to get past it, but yeah. I don't really consider myself one of them anymore and I just want to see if my friend is okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This trip on the water was

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was pretty interesting though. You did quite well out there. I mean, obviously you were like a goblin in water, but you did quite well out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, we did some good. I feel like we're a little closer as a group, and we got those books for you, right? And when we get some paper and some ink, you can learn some new spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am very pleased with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also impressed with you. You have a knack. You have

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would know that I have a knack for stealing things, or what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Well, yeah. I've found that it's pretty fun. You can make people think things that aren't real and you can even change things from one thing to another. You're very good at that, aren't you? [music]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm proud of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good night, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After a few days' journey, tending to your various bits of business, eventually the familiar sound of seagulls gathered near the coast meets your ears on the warm, sunny morning. As you wake up and glance up into the light of day past the stairs that lead to the deck, you can see the familiar sight of the harbor of Nicodranas. There, the familiar visual of the Mother's Lighthouse, greeting you in towards the bay. Caduceus, you can't help be but overtaken with that comforting welcome sense, and you swear for a minute you see her glance in your direction, but you blink-- Hmm, that was strange. You prepare your papers and make your way in towards one of the various openings across the harbor. We'll pick up there next week as it is getting late.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, what a way to start the year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man. That was awesome. I'm sorry that we capsized the boat so fast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was funny!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I've been sitting on that rule set while you guys are at sea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really cool, and it's going to happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, they're going to the archipelago and there is-- okay, cool. No. Okay, well. We're back in Nicodranas. You guys get to try out the rules and tell me how that went! It's funny. Anyway, welcome back! I missed you guys. I missed the game. We missed you guys. We'll be back next Thursday. Then we'll see some of you guys at the art exhibit here in LA next weekend as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Thursday: show! Friday: art show! Saturday: live show! It's going to be busy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a crazy week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be so sick of you mother--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you aren't by now, Laura, you've got no excuse by now. We'll see you guys back here next Thursday. Until then, have a wonderful week. We love you, and is it Thursday yet? Goodnight.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: 2019! [music]
